# Months in a Year

> Number of months in a year.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var MONTHS_IN_YEAR = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/months-in-year' );
```

#### MONTHS_IN_YEAR

Number of months in a year.

``` javascript
MONTHS_IN_YEAR === 12;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var MONTHS_IN_YEAR = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/months-in-year' );

console.log( MONTHS_IN_YEAR );
// => 12
```

</section>
